headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Display name. The maximum length is 100 characters.

parameters.name: image_uri
parameters.description: The ID of the avatar image for the identity. The width and height ratio must be 1:1. To obtain the ID of an avatar image, you can upload the image by using /file/image/ad/upload/ . If this field is not specified, a default image will be used as the avatar.
